name: BlockRun V0.1
description:
(Controls: PC A/D  Mobile tap left and right.)        

This is the first game I have ever made it is called block run.In block run you play as a block avoiding other blocks as you go down the track. Its has ten levels of fun hope you enjoy! | NOTE: if you are using mobile the start screen will be zoomed in but the game will be fine thank you for your understanding enjoy the game.
